name: disjsnxp
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1

body.origin:
|- wdisj(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1))
-| wi(wtru, wdisj(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wdisj(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1))
-| wi(wtru, wdisj(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wtru, wdisj(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)))
-| wi(wtru, wdisj(s0, c0, csn(cv(s0))))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wdisj(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1))
-| wi(wtru, wdisj(s0, c0, csn(cv(s0))))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

body.origin:
|- wi(wtru, wdisj(s0, c0, csn(cv(s0))))
-| wdisj(s0, c0, csn(cv(s0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wdisj(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| wdisj(s0, c0, csn(cv(s0)))

|- wdisj(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

comment: The sets in the cartesian product of singletons with other sets, are disjoint. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Oct-2020.)
